title: Texas-Style Beef & Black Bean Chili
description: Hearty Texas-style chili using hand-cut Chuck Roast and black beans.
ingredients: 2-3 lbs Chuck Roast (1/2-inch cubes, seasoned with Salt/Pepper)
instructions: Sear: Brown beef cubes in oil/tallow over high heat in batches. Remove.
Sweat: Lower heat. Cook onions (5m) then add garlic & spice blend (1m).
Deglaze: Add splash of broth, scraping fond. Return beef to pot.
Simmer: Add remaining broth, tomatoes, and beans. Cover and simmer low for 2-2.5 hrs.
The 'Buffer': 10 minutes before eating, sauté kale with sliced garlic until wilted.
Serve: Ladle chili over/next to tepid potato. Side of garlic kale. Top with Cilantro.

title: Chicken "Pot Pie" Stew
description: Braised Chicken Thighs in a rich, herb-filled broth with potato dumplings.
instructions: Sear: Skin-side down in soup pot (med-high) until crispy golden. Flip, sear 2m. Remove.
Sauté: Drain excess fat (keep 2 tbsp). Cook onion, carrot, celery (5m).
Combine: Add broth, potatoes, herbs. Nestle chicken back in.
Simmer: Boil, then low cover for 35-40m.
Shred: Remove chicken, discard bones/skin, shred meat, return to pot.
Finish: Add peas. Stir in cornstarch slurry if you want it thick.
Cool: Let sit 30m before packing/serving (firms up potatoes).

title: Chicken Tinga Bowls
description: Marinated Chicken Strips simmered in Chipotle-Tomato sauce over cabbage.
instructions: Sear: Pan-fry chicken strips on high heat (cooked through).
Simmer: Lower heat, add onions (soften), then pour in salsa. Simmer 5-10m.
Mix Salad: In a bowl, toss cold potatoes, corn, mayo, lime, chili powder, cilantro, salt.
Assemble: Big bed of cabbage -> Hot Tinga Chicken -> Scoop of Cold Potato Salad.
Garnish: Radishes on top.

title: Creamy Pollock Chowder
description: Gentle poached Pollock Filets in a dairy-free creamy base.
instructions: Roast: Oven 400F. Brussels sprouts w/ oil & salt (20-25m).
Sweat: Pot, med heat. Onion & celery (5m).
Boil: Add stock, potatoes, Old Bay. Boil 10-12m (until tender).
Enrich: Add coconut milk and corn. Bring to return simmer.
Poach: Add fish chunks. COVER. Turn Heat OFF (or very low). Sit 5-7m.
Serve: Gentle ladle (save the chunks). Side of crispy sprouts.

title: Potato & Chickpea Coconut Curry
description: Creamy coconut broth with Chickpeas and warming spices.
instructions: Bloom: Hot oil. Sauté onion (5m). Add garlic/ginger/spices (1m).
Combine: Add potatoes, chickpeas, milk, broth.
Simmer: Cover, low heat, 15-20m (until potatoes soft).
Wilt: Stir in spinach in batches.
Acid: Squeeze lime juice. Adjust salt.
Serve: Bowl up with roasted cauliflower on the side.
